youtube.title: Why Sperm Cannot Enter the Uterus During Pregnancy | Biology Explained
youtube.description: Discover the biological mechanism that protects a developing fetus. This video explains how the mucus plug forms a protective barrier during pregnancy to prevent infection and block further sperm from entering the uterus. Perfect for students and science enthusiasts!
